game.title: The Lost Sword
game.description: The ancient sword of the kingdom was stolen by a fearsome dragon. The king has demanded its return. Venture into the dragon's lair, defeat the beast and bring back the sword for a hefty reward.

task.description: Consult with the local villagers and gather information about the location of the dragon's lair.
Challenge the dragon that stole the sword. Be prepared for a fierce fight.
Once the dragon is defeated, search its lair for the lost sword.
